MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL57 postcode area of Bethesda, affecting properties in Cilgeraint and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:18AM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of damage caused to an electrical pole by a fallen tree and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:36PM on 30th January 2021.
